readme.title: README
readme.entries:
"Hey there! To setup this widget correctly, you'll need to install Tasker. Please read the setup instructions at my GitHub here:
<URL>

Highlights of this widget are a OneUI based interface thats full customizable down to margins and corner radius. Features includes:
- Modify icon sizes, padding and spacing to get the look you want
- Automatic resizing and adjusting of layout, with further manual adjustments
- "setup" mode which allows you to view all the data for spacing and icons you need
And many more!

Created by Corey Welsh to fill the need of an easy-setup Home Assistant widget also looks great"
readme.value:
Hey there! To setup this widget correctly, you'll need to install Tasker. Please read the setup instructions at my GitHub here:
<URL>

Highlights of this widget are a OneUI based interface thats full customizable down to margins and corner radius. Features includes:
- Modify icon sizes, padding and spacing to get the look you want
- Automatic resizing and adjusting of layout, with further manual adjustments
- setup mode which allows you to view all the data for spacing and icons you need
And many more!

Created by Corey Welsh to fill the need of an easy-setup Home Assistant widget also looks great

- 1..entries:
-- Color Options --
Click to read color editing options

To edit the filters put onto the color, look for the dark or light color calculations in the flows tab. Follow the guide on github for color edits

colors/col1sel.title: col1sel
colors/col1sel.description: Color 1 - Choose the color source for Box 2 background. If you dont use the color picker, set a color you like, and it will be used as a fallback

colors/col1sysc.title: col1sysc
colors/col1sysc.description:
Color 1 - System/MaterialYou Only
Choose a color tone.

colors/col1fil2.title: col1fil2
colors/col1fil2.description: Color 1 - Choose filter manipulation - Changes slider above from total into add/subtract from current (optional)

colors/col1pick.title: col1pick
colors/col1pick.description:
Color 1 - Manual Color choice, overrides filter
Also used as fallback color for extracted colors

colors/col2sel.title: col2sel
colors/col2sel.description: Color 2 - Choose the color source for Box 2 background. If you dont use the color picker, set a color you like, and it will be used as a fallback

colors/col2sysc.title: col2sysc
colors/col2sysc.description:
Color 2 - System/MaterialYou Only
Choose a color tone

colors/col2fil2.title: col2fil2
colors/col2fil2.description: Color 2 - Choose filter manipulation - Changes number above from total into add/subtract from current (optional)

colors/col2pick.title: col2pick
colors/col2pick.description:
Color 2 - Manual Color choice, overrides filter.
Also used as fallback color for extracted colors

colors/colico.title: colico
colors/colico.description: Color of icons and text. Default: #E7FFFFFF

colors/colicoon.title: colicoon
colors/colicoon.description: Color of icons and text when device is on

colors/col2fin.title: col2fin
colors/col2fin.description: Final output of color in Hex ARGB form

devcount.title: devcount
devcount.description: Choose how many devices you'd like to control with this Widget, then select the style below

1-device.title: 1-device
1-device.description: For 1 device control. Choose your widget style. The chosen style will determine what templates are avaliable.
1-device.entries:
DATA##"Control 1 device with a style below. The chosen style will determine what templates are avaliable.",0##Single Row
Single Box,1##Double Row
Single Box,2##Single Row
Double Box,3##Double Row
Double Box

2-device.title: 2-device
2-device.description: For 2 device control. Choose your widget style. The chosen style will determine what templates are avaliable.
2-device.entries:
DATA##"Control 2 devices with a style below. The chosen style will determine what templates are avaliable.",1##Single Row
Double Box,2##Double Row
One row per device,3##Double Row
One box per device

devicovi.title: devicovi
devicovi.description:
Show/Hide the device icon in the corner of widget
Default: Show

devico.title: devico
devico.description: Choose the device icon to display in the corner of the widget. Hide it below. See Docs for custom icons
devico.entries: DATA##Choose the device icon for the device you want to control,0##Lights,1##Climate,2##Television,3##Audio,4##Security,5##Charging and Battery,6##Remote control,7##Custom (See Docs)

box1size.title: box1size
box1size.description: Choose number of columns or "Remove" if using a one box setting above. Some preset templates will move the second icon to "0" in Box 2 if set to 1 column
box1size.entries: DATA##"Choose number of columns or "Remove" if using a one box setting above. Some preset templates will move the second icon to "0" in Box 2 if set to 1 column",0##Remove (Single box widget),15##1 Column, 35##2 Column

box2alig.title: box2alig
box2alig.description:
Choose Centered for templates that specifiy or dont have icons (like komponents).
Default: Beside Box

boxorder.title: boxorder
boxorder.description: Set the order of the boxes on your widget. Box 1 is usually the smaller box with controls in it
boxorder.entries: DATA##'Set the order of the boxes on your widget. Box 1 is usually the smaller box with controls in it',1##Box 1 > Box 2,0##Box 2 > Box 1

boxrad.title: boxrad
boxrad.description:
Set the radius of the rounded corners.
Default: 10kpx

icosize.title: icosize
icosize.description:
Set the size of the device control icons.
Default: 80kpx

appico.title: appico
appico.description:
Set the size of the small app-launcher icon(s).
Default: 32kpx

appicovi.title: appicovi
appicovi.description:
Hide the app icons.
Off = Show settings, On = Hide settings

devicosc.title: devicosc
devicosc.description:
Control the size of the device icon.
Default: Auto-adjust
devicosc.entries: 0##Normal Device icon size, 1##Match small icons, 2## Auto-shrink for smaller widget

icodevsz.title: icodevsz
icodevsz.description:
Set the size of the widgets device icon if not shrunk above
Default: 120kpx

openedit.title: openedit
openedit.description: Enable device icon click to open KWGT Editor. Diable once widget is set up

verpad.title: verpad
verpad.description:
Set the padding from the edge of screen to the side of widget.
Default: 15kpx

horpad.title: horpad
horpad.description: Set the padding from the edge of screen to the top/bottom of widget. Will double when two widgets are stacked. Default: 4kpx

setupmde.title: setupmde
setupmde.description: Enable showing setup data. This will give you numbers and information for fine-tuning the widget to fit your device screen

apicopad.title: apicopad
apicopad.description: ADVANCED: Remove icon padding for settings while leaving icons. You may need to adjust icon size to prevent overlapping. Default: Off

autoalig.title: autoalig
autoalig.description: ADVANCED - Manually set layout direction of widget. Use with next 2 options to configure

wgtalign.title: wgtalign
wgtalign.description: ADVANCED - Auto horizontal or vertical alignment based on widget sizing

position.title: position
position.description: ADVANCED - Change the alignment of Box 1. Use with two previous settings
position.entries: LEFT##Left - Horizontal Layout, RIGHT##Right - Horizontal Layout, TOP##Top - Vertical Layout, BOTTOM##Bottom - Vertical Layout

generate.title: generate
generate.description: Generated Globals. Editing these formulas may cause unintended issues. Proceed with caution.

generate/wgtwidth.title: wgtwidth
generate/wgtwidth.description: GENERATED - Width of widget, minus padding

generate/wgtheigh.title: wgtheigh
generate/wgtheigh.description: GENERATED - Height of widget, minus padding

generate/box2min.title: box2min
generate/box2min.description: GENERATED - Minimum size of Box 2. Based on 2 icons and padding

generate/icocount.title: icocount
generate/icocount.description: GENERATED - Number of icons visible in a Box 2. Based on widget size and padding
generate/icocount.global_formula: $lv(icon, gv(icosize) + gv(icopad))$$lv(devicosi, if(gv(devicoge) gv(icodevsz), gv(icodevsz), gv(appico)))$$lv(padding, if(apicopad = 0, #devicosi), 0)$$lv(boxsize1, if(gv(wgtalign) = 0, gv(generate/box2wid), gv(generate/box2hei)))$$lv(boxsize2, #boxsize1 - #padding)$$lv(count, #boxsize2 / #icon)$$if(#count <= 2, 2, tc(cut, mu(abs,#count), 1))$

generate/devicoge.title: devicoge
generate/devicoge.description: GENERATED - Shrink Device icon. Uses app icon size and padding to align outside edge of icons
generate/devicoge.global_formula:
$lv(small, gv(icopad) + gv(appico))$
$lv(large, gv(icodevsz))$
$lv(autoshr, (if(gv(generate/icocount) < 4 & gv(devicosc) = 2, 1, 0)))$
$lv(1row, (if(si(rheight) <= 150, 1, 0)))$
$if(#autoshr = 1 | gv(devicosc) = 1 | #1row = 1, #small, #autoshr = 0 | gv(devicosc) = 0, #large)$

generate/pagenum.title: pagenum
generate/pagenum.description: GENERATED - Number of current page for paging templates

generate/col1.title: col1
generate/col1.description: GENERATED - Background color generated from user settings for smaller box
generate/col1.global_formula: $lv(source, (if(gv(colors/col1sel) = 0, "wpcolor1", gv(colors/col1sel) = 1, "wpcolor2", gv(colors/col1sel) = 2, "sys", "0")))$$lv(filter, (if(gv(colors/col1fil1) = 1, "sat", gv(colors/col1fil1) = 2, "lum", gv(colors/col1fil1) = 3, "comp", "sat")))$$lv(coltone, (if(gv(colors/col1sysc) = 0, "sysca1", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 1, "sysca2", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 2, "sysca3", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 3, "syscn1", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 4, "syscn2", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 5, "syscn3", "sysca1")))$$lv(addsub, (if(gv(colors/col1fil2) = 0, "", gv(colors/col1fil2) = 1, "a", gv(colors/col1fil2) = 2, "r", "")))$$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) > 0 & (#source = "wpcolor1" | #source = "wpcolor2"), lv(col1, ce(si(#source), #filter, gv(colors/col1adj))))$$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) > 0 & #source = "sys", lv(col2, si(#coltone, gv(colors/col1adj))))$$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) = 0 | gv(colors/col1sel) = 3, lv(col3, gv(colors/col1pick)))$$lv(color, (if(gv(colors/col1sel) <= 1, #col1, gv(colors/col1sel) = 2, #col2, gv(colors/col1sel) = 3, #col3)))$$lv(final, ce(#color, alpha, mu(round, gv(colors/col1alph), 0)))$$#final$

generate/col2.title: col2
generate/col2.description: GENERATED - Background color generated from user settings for Box 2
generate/col2.global_formula: $lv(source, (if(gv(colors/col2sel) = 0, "wpcolor1", gv(colors/col2sel) = 1, "wpcolor2", gv(colors/col2sel) = 2, "sys", "0")))$$lv(filter, (if(gv(colors/col2fil1) = 1, "sat", gv(colors/col2fil1) = 2, "lum", gv(colors/col2fil1) = 3, "comp", "sat")))$$lv(coltone, (if(gv(colors/col2sysc) = 0, "sysca1", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 1, "sysca2", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 2, "sysca3", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 3, "syscn1", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 4, "syscn2", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 5, "syscn3", "sysca1")))$$lv(addsub, (if(gv(colors/col2fil2) = 0, "", gv(colors/col2fil2) = 1, "a", gv(colors/col2fil2) = 2, "r", "")))$$if(gv(colors/col2fil1) > 0 & (#source = "wpcolor1" | #source = "wpcolor2"), lv(col1, ce(si(#source), #filter, gv(colors/col2adj))))$$if(gv(colors/col2fil1) > 0 & #source = "sys", lv(col2, si(#coltone, gv(colors/col2adj))))$$if(gv(colors/col2fil1) = 0 | gv(colors/col2sel) = 3, lv(col3, gv(colors/col2pick)))$$lv(color, (if(gv(colors/col2sel) <= 1, #col1, gv(colors/col2sel) = 2, #col2, gv(colors/col2sel) = 3, #col3)))$$lv(final, ce(#color, alpha, mu(round, gv(colors/col2alph), 0)))$$#final$

tasker.title: tasker
tasker.description: Global variables to be updated with tasker data

tasker/info.title: INFO
tasker/info.value: -- Date sent and received from HA/Tasker

tasker/sendtoha.title: sendtoha
tasker/sendtoha.description: TASKER - Device control data to send to tasker from button click

tasker/stateupd.title: stateupd
tasker/stateupd.description: State information sent from tasker to apply to "tasker/statedat". Only entitites listed in HA Tasker blueprint are sent.

formulas.title: formulas
formulas.description: Formulas used for calling from formula boxes. Editing these formulas may cause unintended issues. Proceed with caution.

formulas/devstate.title: devstate
formulas/devstate.description: FORMULA - Code used to determine device state

formulas/lgtlevel.title: lgtlevel
formulas/lgtlevel.description: FORMULA - Code used to determine light brightness level
formulas/lgtlevel.value: $if(tc(reg, gv(tasker/statedat), #glbname, #glbname) != "", sh("echo '" + gv(tasker/statedat) + "' | tr ';;' '\n' | awk -F':' '/^" + #glbname + ":/ {print $3}' | grep -E '^[0-9]+$' || echo 0"))$

formulas/lgtcolor.title: lgtcolor
formulas/lgtcolor.description: FORMULA - Code used to determine light color
formulas/lgtcolor.value: $if(tc(reg, gv(tasker/statedat), #glbname, #glbname) != "", sh("echo '" + gv(tasker/statedat) + "' | tr ';;' '\n' | awk -F':' '/^" + #glbname + ":/ {print $4}' | grep -E '^[0-9]{1,3},[0-9]{1,3},[0-9]{1,3}'"))$

formulas/icostack.title: icostack
formulas/icostack.value: $if(gv(position) = RIGHT, VERTICAL_RIGHT, gv(position) = LEFT, VERTICAL_LEFT,  gv(position) = TOP, HORIZONTAL_TOP,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, HORIZONTAL_BOTTOM)$

formulas/icopos.title: icopos
formulas/icopos.value: $if(gv(position) = RIGHT, CENTERRIGHT, gv(position) = LEFT, CENTERLEFT,  gv(position) = TOP, TOP,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, BOTTOM)$

params.formula:
$lv(source, (if(gv(colors/col1sel) = 0, "wpcolor1", gv(colors/col1sel) = 1, "wpcolor2", gv(colors/col1sel) = 2, "sys", "0")))$
$lv(filter, (if(gv(colors/col1fil1) = 1, "sat", gv(colors/col1fil1) = 2, "lum", gv(colors/col1fil1) = 3, "comp", "sat")))$
$lv(coltone, (if(gv(colors/col1sysc) = 0, "sysca1", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 1, "sysca2", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 2, "sysca3", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 3, "syscn1", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 4, "syscn2", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 5, "syscn3", "sysca1")))$
$lv(addsub, (if(gv(colors/col1fil2) = 0, "", gv(colors/col1fil2) = 1, "a", gv(colors/col1fil2) = 2, "r", "")))$

$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) > 0 & (#source = "wpcolor1" | #source = "wpcolor2"), lv(col1, ce(si(#source), #filter, gv(colors/col1adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) > 0 & #source = "sys", lv(col2, si(#coltone, gv(colors/col1adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) = 0 | gv(colors/col1sel) = 3, lv(col3, gv(colors/col1pick)))$

$lv(color, (if(gv(colors/col1sel) <= 1, #col1, gv(colors/col1sel) = 2, #col2, gv(colors/col1sel) = 3, #col3)))$
$lv(final, ce(#color, alpha, mu(round, gv(colors/col1alph), 0)))$
$#final$

$lv(source, (if(gv(colors/col2sel) = 0, "wpcolor1", gv(colors/col2sel) = 1, "wpcolor2", gv(colors/col2sel) = 2, "sys", "0")))$
$lv(filter, (if(gv(colors/col2fil1) = 1, "sat", gv(colors/col2fil1) = 2, "lum", gv(colors/col2fil1) = 3, "comp", "sat")))$
$lv(coltone, (if(gv(colors/col2sysc) = 0, "sysca1", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 1, "sysca2", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 2, "sysca3", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 3, "syscn1", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 4, "syscn2", gv(colors/col2sysc) = 5, "syscn3", "sysca1")))$
$lv(addsub, (if(gv(colors/col2fil2) = 0, "", gv(colors/col2fil2) = 1, "a", gv(colors/col2fil2) = 2, "r", "")))$

$if(gv(colors/col2fil1) > 0 & (#source = "wpcolor1" | #source = "wpcolor2"), lv(col1, ce(si(#source), #filter, gv(colors/col2adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/col2fil1) > 0 & #source = "sys", lv(col2, si(#coltone, gv(colors/col2adj))))$
$if(gv(colors/col2fil1) = 0 | gv(colors/col2sel) = 3, lv(col3, gv(colors/col2pick)))$


$lv(color, (if(gv(colors/col2sel) <= 1, #col1, gv(colors/col2sel) = 2, #col2, gv(colors/col2sel) = 3, #col3)))$
$lv(final, ce(#color, alpha, mu(round, gv(colors/col2alph), 0)))$
$#final$

$lv(srvccall, tc(split, gv(tasker/sendtoha), "&", 0))$$lv(entityid, tc(split, gv(tasker/sendtoha), "&", 1))$$lv(data, tc(split, gv(tasker/sendtoha), "&", 2))$$lv(recomb, (if(#srvccall = "template", ("tasker://secondary?service_call=" + #srvccall + "&parameters=" + #entityid), ("tasker://secondary?service_call=" + #srvccall + "&entity_id=" + #entityid + "&parameters=" + #data))))$$#recomb$

$lv(entity, tc(json, gv(tasker/stateupd), ".entity_id"))$
$lv(exists, if(tc(json, gv(tasker/jsondata), "$.device_states[?(@.entity_id == '" + #entity + "')].entity_id") != "", 1, 0))$
$lv(datawipe, sh("echo '" + gv(tasker/jsondata) + "' | tr -d '\n' | sed 's/ //g'", 1/60))$
$lv(jsonwipe, sh("echo '" + gv(tasker/stateupd) + "' | tr -d '\n' | sed 's/ //g'", 1/60))$
$lv(jsonrem, (if(#exists = 1, sh("echo '" + #datawipe + "' | sed 's/{" + tc(utf, 22) + "entity_id" + tc(utf, 22) + ":" + tc(utf, 22) + #entity + tc(utf, 22) + "[^}]*},//'", 1/60), #datawipe)))$
$lv(jsonout, sh("echo '" + #jsonrem + "' | sed 's/},]}/}, " + #jsonwipe + "]}/'", 1/60))$
$#jsonout$
$if(#exists = 1, sh("echo '" + #datawipe + "' | sed 's/{" + tc(utf, 22) + "entity_id" + tc(utf, 22) + ":" + tc(utf, 22) + #entity + tc(utf, 22) + "[^}]*},//'", "0.0167"), #datawipe)$
$if(#exists = 1, sh("echo '" + #datawipe + "' | sed 's/{" + tc(utf, 22) + "entity_id" + tc(utf, 22) + ":" + tc(utf, 22) + #entity + tc(utf, 22) + "[^}]*},//'", "0.0167"), #datawipe)$

$lv(entity, tc(json, gv(tasker/stateupd), ".entity_id"))$
$lv(exists, if(tc(json, gv(tasker/jsondata), "$.device_states[?(@.entity_id == '" + #entity + "')].entity_id") != "", 1, 0))$
$lv(datawipe, sh("echo '" + gv(tasker/jsondata) + "' | tr -d '\n' | sed 's/ //g'"))$
$lv(jsonwipe, sh("echo '" + gv(tasker/stateupd) + "' | tr -d '\n' | sed 's/ //g'"))$
$lv(jsonrem, (if(#exists = 1, sh("echo '" + #datawipe + "' | sed 's/{" + tc(utf, 22) + "entity_id" + tc(utf, 22) + ":" + tc(utf, 22) + #entity + tc(utf, 22) + "[^}]*},//'"), #datawipe)))$
$lv(jsonout, sh("echo '" + #jsonrem + "' | sed 's/},]}/}, " + #jsonwipe + "]}/'"))$
$#jsonout$

viewgroup_items.internal_title: -- Box 2 is used for single box mode

viewgroup_items.text_expression:
To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Set column count to 1
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Set column count to 1
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration 

Note:
-- If Column count is set to 1, the second icon will be hidden and reappear as "Icon 0" in Box 2

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 1
-- 3 Set column count to 1
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

To use this template:
-- 1 Go back one page and duplicate this group. Reopen duplicate
-- 2 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 3 Set column count to icon count
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

Blank Template: 1-2 icons or 1 image

Setup Blank Template:
-- Icons - Copy icons into row group (max 2)
-- Image - Remove row group and copy image

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Set column count to 2
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration 

Note:
-- If Column count is set to 1, the second icons will be hidden and reappear as "Icon 0" in Box 2

To use this template:
-- 1 Go back one page and duplicate this group. Reopen duplicate
-- 2 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 3 Set column count to icon count
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

Blank Template: 2-4 icons or 1 image

Setup Blank Template:
-- Icons - Copy icons to Icon folder in row groups (1 per folder)
-- Image - Remove row groups and copy image

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

Blank Template: Unlimited icons or 1 image

Setup Blank Template:
-- Icons - Copy icons into row group
-- Image - Remove row group and copy image

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Set column count to 1
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

To use this template:
-- 1 Go back one page and duplicate this group. Reopen duplicate
-- 2 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 3 Pair with matching template in Box 1
-- 4 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

To use this template:
-- 1 Go back one page and duplicate this group. Reopen duplicate
-- 2 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 3 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

Blank Template: Unlimited icons or 1 image

Setup Blank Template:
-- Icons - Copy icons into row group (max 2)
-- Image - Remove row group and copy image
This is a "Pages" template, which means each icon click in Box 1 changes ther visible page in Box 2, allowing 4 devices to be controlled from 1 page.

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration 

Note:
-- If Column count is set to 1, you can only control 2 rooms
This is a "Pages" template, which means each icon click in Box 1 changes ther visible page in Box 2, allowing 4 devices to be controlled from 1 page.

internal_formulas.config_stacking: $if(gv(position) = RIGHT, HORIZONTAL_CENTER, gv(position) = LEFT, HORIZONTAL_CENTER,  gv(position) = TOP, VERTICAL_CENTER,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, VERTICAL_CENTER)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, VERTICAL_CENTER, gv(position) = LEFT, VERTICAL_CENTER,  gv(position) = TOP, HORIZONTAL_CENTER,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, HORIZONTAL_CENTER)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, VERTICAL_CENTER, gv(position) = LEFT, VERTICAL_CENTER,  gv(position) = TOP, HORIZONTAL_CENTER,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, HORIZONTAL_CENTER)$

viewgroup_items.text_expression:
To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

Note: If Column count is set to 1, you can only control 2 rooms 

Blank Template: Unlimited icons or 1 image

Setup Blank Template:
-- Icons - Copy icons into row group
-- Image - Remove row group and copy image
This is a "Pages" template, which means each icon click in Box 1 changes ther visible page in Box 2, allowing 4 devices to be controlled from 1 page.

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2
-- 3 Edit touch actions for each icon to match your Home Assistant Configuration

Note:
-- If Column count is set to 1, the second icon will be hidden and reappear as "Icon 0" in Box 2

To use this template:
-- 1 Set visibility of previously enabled templates in this folder to "Remove"
-- 2 Pair with matching template in Box 2

internal_formulas.paint_color: $lv(glbname, "light.bedroom_lights")$$if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel), (if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel) >= 1, (if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel) <= 75, (if(gv(formulas/devstate) = on, gv(generate/col1), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))$

$lv(glbname, "light.bedroom_lights")$$if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel), (if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel) >= 76, (if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel) <= 200, (if(gv(formulas/devstate) = on, gv(generate/col1), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))$

$lv(glbname, "light.study_lights")$$if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel), (if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel) >= 1, (if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel) <= 75, (if(gv(formulas/devstate) = on, gv(generate/col1), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))$

$lv(glbname, "light.study_lights")$$if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel), (if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel) >= 76, (if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel) <= 200, (if(gv(formulas/devstate) = on, gv(generate/col1), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))$

$lv(glbname, "light.foyer_lights")$$if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel), (if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel) >= 1, (if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel) <= 75, (if(gv(formulas/devstate) = on, gv(generate/col1), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))$

$lv(glbname, "light.foyer_lights")$$if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel), (if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel) >= 76, (if(gv(formulas/lgtlevel) <= 200, (if(gv(formulas/devstate) = on, gv(generate/col1), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))), gv(colors/colico))$

internal_formulas.position_anchor: $if(gv(position) = RIGHT, TOPLEFT, gv(position) = LEFT, TOPRIGHT,  gv(position) = TOP, BOTTOMLEFT,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, TOPLEFT)$

internal_formulas.icon_rotate_mode: $if(gv(position) = RIGHT, NONE, gv(position) = LEFT, NONE,  gv(position) = TOP, DEG270,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, NONE)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, NONE, gv(position) = LEFT, DEG90,  gv(position) = TOP, DEG270,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, NONE)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, NONE, gv(position) = LEFT, DEG90,  gv(position) = TOP, DEG270,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, FLIP_Y)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, NONE, gv(position) = LEFT, DEG90,  gv(position) = TOP, DEG270,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, NONE)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, NONE, gv(position) = LEFT, DEG90,  gv(position) = TOP, DEG270,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, NONE)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, NONE, gv(position) = LEFT, DEG90,  gv(position) = TOP, DEG270,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, NONE)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, NONE, gv(position) = LEFT, NONE,  gv(position) = TOP, DEG180,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, NONE)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, NONE, gv(position) = LEFT, DEG90,  gv(position) = TOP, DEG270,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, NONE)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, NONE, gv(position) = LEFT, DEG90,  gv(position) = TOP, DEG270,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, NONE)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, NONE, gv(position) = LEFT, DEG90,  gv(position) = TOP, DEG270,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, NONE)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, NONE, gv(position) = LEFT, NONE,  gv(position) = TOP, DEG270,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, DEG180)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, NONE, gv(position) = LEFT, DEG90,  gv(position) = TOP, DEG270,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, NONE)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, NONE, gv(position) = LEFT, DEG90,  gv(position) = TOP, DEG270,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, NONE)$

internal_formulas.position_anchor: $if(gv(position) = RIGHT, BOTTOMLEFT, gv(position) = LEFT, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(position) = TOP, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, TOPRIGHT)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, BOTTOMLEFT, gv(position) = LEFT, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(position) = TOP, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, TOPRIGHT)$
$if(gv(position) = RIGHT, BOTTOMLEFT, gv(position) = LEFT, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(position) = TOP, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, TOPRIGHT)$

viewgroup_items.text_expression:
$lv(source, (if(gv(colors/col1sel) = 0, "wpcolor1", gv(colors/col1sel) = 1, "wpcolor2", gv(colors/col1sel) = 2, "sys", "0")))$source: $#source$
$lv(filter, (if(gv(colors/col1fil1) = 1, "sat", gv(colors/col1fil1) = 2, "lum", gv(colors/col1fil1) = 3, "comp", "sat")))$filter: $#filter$
$lv(coltone, (if(gv(colors/col1sysc) = 0, "sysca1", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 1, "sysca2", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 2, "sysca3", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 3, "syscn1", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 4, "syscn2", gv(colors/col1sysc) = 5, "syscn3", "sysca1")))$color tone: $#coltone$
$lv(addsub, (if(gv(colors/col1fil2) = 0, "", gv(colors/col1fil2) = 1, "a", gv(colors/col1fil2) = 2, "r", "")))$ addsub: $#addsub$

$si(#source)$
$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) > 0 & (#source = "wpcolor1" | #source = "wpcolor2"), lv(col1, ce(si(#source), #filter, gv(colors/col1adj))))$wpcolor: $#col1$
$ce("#FF000101", sat, 45)$
$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) > 0 & #source = "sys", lv(col2, si(#coltone, gv(colors/col1adj))))$sysui: $#col2$
$if(gv(colors/col1fil1) = 0 | gv(colors/col1sel) = 3, lv(col3, gv(colors/col1pick)))$colpick: $#col3$

$lv(color, (if(gv(colors/col1sel) <= 1, #col1, gv(colors/col1sel) = 2, #col2, gv(colors/col1sel) = 3, #col3)))$$#color$
$lv(final, ce(#color, alpha, gv(colors/col1alph)))$
Final color: $#final$

Widget Padding: $gv(verpad)$ Side, $gv(horpad)$ Top
Icon: $gv(icosize)$kpx, $tc(reg, gv(generate/icocount), "\n", "")$ Vis
Icon Padding:$gv(icopad)$ Edge, $gv(icopad)$ MID

[bl=-10]Widget: $si(rwidth)$W, $si(rheight)$H, $si(rratio)$ 1:1
Box Area: $tc(reg, gv(generate/box2min), "\n", "")$ Min, $gv(generate/box2wid)$W/$gv(generate/box2hei)$H

$lv(icon, gv(icosize) + gv(icopad))$$lv(lgbox, if(gv(wgtalign) = 0, gv(generate/box2wid), gv(generate/box2hei)))$$lv(adjustment, if(gv(apicopad) = 0, gv(appico), 0))$$lv(boxsize, #lgbox - #adjustment)$Icon to size ratio: $mu(abs, #boxsize /#icon)$[/bl]

internal_formulas.paint_color:
$lv(newstate, gv(tasker/stateupd))$$lv(allstate, gv(tasker/statedat))$$lv(entityid, tc(split, #newstate, ":", 0))$$lv(exists, sh("echo '" + #allstate + "' | tr ';;' '\n' | awk -F':' '/^" + #entityid + ":/ {print $1}'"))$
$lv(adddata, if(#exists != "",(tc(reg, #allstate, #entityid + ":.*", (#newstate + ";;")), #allstate + "
" + #newstate + ";;")))$$lv(dedupe, (sh("echo '" + #adddata + "' | tr ';;' '\n' | awk -F':' '!seen[$1]++ {print $0 \";;\"}'")))$

internal_formulas.position_anchor: $if(gv(position) = RIGHT, TOPLEFT, gv(position) = LEFT, TOPRIGHT,  gv(position) = TOP, BOTTOMLEFT,  gv(position) = BOTTOM, TOPLEFT)$
